title: A pair for Whitney?
content:
Hi,

What serif would you pair with Whitney

[http://www.typography.com/catalog/whitney/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020190340/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/whitney/ "http://www.typography.com/catalog/whitney/")

Many Thanks - Jeff
author: JB01

comments.content: We do need more information, but I've used Farhham with Whitney and Whitney Condensed.
Thanks - I'm considering Whitney as a wordmark, and the serif would be letter text.

I've paired Whitney and Kandal in a magazine with success.

[http://www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/kandal.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020190340/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/kandal.html "http://www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/kandal.html")
